items.name: Lindt LINDOR Caramel Milk Chocolate Mini Eggs Bag
items.description: Have fun browsing our huge selection of all-natural Easter candies below! You'll find dye-free candy for your Easter egg hunt, treats to fill baskets, and gifts to send family and friends!

items.name: Lindt Premium Easter Chocolate Gift Box
items.description: Make Easter moments magical with the Lindt Premium Easter Chocolate Gift Box. This pack of six individually wrapped Easter chocolates includes LINDOR Assorted Mini Eggs!

items.name: Lindt GOLD BUNNY Milk Chocolate Easter Bunny
items.description: Delight kids and adults alike this Easter with the Lindt GOLD BUNNY Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Easter Bunny. This delectable hollow bunny made of creamy Swiss milk chocolate with crunchy hazelnut pieces comes wrapped in gold foil!

items.name: Lindt LINDOR Milk Chocolate Eggs
items.description: Make Easter moments magical with the Lindt LINDOR Milk Chocolate Eggs Trio, crafted by Lindt Maître Chocolatiers. This limited edition chocolate gift set features three Lindt LINDOR milk chocolate eggs with irresistibly smooth melting milk chocolate centres!

items.name: Lindt Easter Hen Milk Chocolate Eggs Bag
items.description: Make Easter moments magical for the chocolate lovers in your life with Lindt Easter Hen Milk Chocolate Eggs. These classic chocolate Easter eggs are made with milk chocolate wrapped in brightly coloured foil, making them the ideal choice for Easter egg hunts, filling Easter baskets, or for festive Easter entertaining!

items.name: Lindt Milk Chocolate Candy Coated Mini Eggs Bag
items.description: Make Easter moments magical for everyone in the family with Lindt Milk Chocolate Candy Coated Mini Eggs. These classic Easter chocolates are a favourite of chocolate lovers of all ages thanks to gourmet Swiss milk chocolate covered in a crisp, colourful candy shell!

items.name: Lindt Milk Chocolate Easter Chick
items.description: Make Easter moments magical with the Lindt Milk Chocolate Easter Chick. Crafted by Lindt Maître Chocolatiers, this gourmet chocolate chick is made of rich and creamy Lindt Swiss milk chocolate and is hollow on the inside.!

items.name: Lindt Milk Chocolate Crispy Eggs Bag
items.description: Make Easter moments magical with the colourful foils and decadent chocolate of Lindt Milk Chocolate Crispy Eggs. Beloved by children and chocolate connoisseurs alike, these gourmet Easter chocolates feature a crispy centre surrounded by smooth melting chocolate and a solid milk chocolate shell to create a deeply satisfying chocolate experience.!

items.name: Lindt Milk Chocolate Carrots Gift Box
items.description: Share a special springtime treat and make Easter moments magical with the Lindt Milk Chocolate Carrots Gift Box. Crafted by Lindt Maître Chocolatiers, this limited edition gift set features four carrots made of decadent Lindt milk chocolate!
